byline.contributor: Christina Anderson and Elisabetta Povoledo contributed reporting.

abstract: Syrian asylum seeker Haisam Omar Sakhanh is arrested in Sweden on charges of participating in mass killing of war prisoners in 2012.

headline.print_headline: Sweden Charges Syrian Tied to Killings
headline.main: Syrian Asylum Seeker Linked to Mass Killing Is Arrested in Sweden

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A man who sought asylum in Sweden is believed to be among a group of Syrian rebels who were recorded executing seven soldiers in 2012.
lead_paragraph: A man who sought asylum in Sweden is believed to be among a group of Syrian rebels who were recorded executing seven soldiers in 2012.
